update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CAP_PRICE
SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NORMAL_CAP_ONE_TIME = #{normalCapOneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMAL_CAP_ONE_PRICE = #{normalCapOnePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMAL_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE = #{normalCapOneUnitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NORMAL_CAP_TWO_TIME = #{normalCapTwoTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CAP_PRICE_ID = #{capPriceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CAP_PRICE set SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NORMAL_CAP_ONE_TIME = #{normalCapOneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAP_ONE_PRICE = #{normalCapOnePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE = #{normalCapOneUnitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAP_TWO_TIME = #{normalCapTwoTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAP_TWO_PRICE = #{normalCapTwoPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NORMAL_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE = #{normalCapTwoUnitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_TIME = #{weekendCapOneTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_PRICE = #{weekendCapOnePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_ONE_UNIT_PRICE = #{weekendCapOneUnitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_TIME = #{weekendCapTwoTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_PRICE = #{weekendCapTwoPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEEKEND_CAP_TWO_UNIT_PRICE = #{weekendCapTwoUnitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CAP_PRICE_ID = #{capPriceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME AS scenicSpotName FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CAP_PRICE A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_ID where A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId}
